name: eXtremaNET
description:
eXtremaNET is a custom software development company . We create customizable webs in .NET, apps for IOS and Android using Titanium and PhoneGap and games for any devices using Unity 3D
We have been developing bespoke software since 2003 especially sotware for data management, corporative backend with .NET and SQL Server environments.
